author: jeremyp1
content: Hey Everyone ðŸ‘‹ , a quick question. Are Deben and Cancun only upgrades that are currently planned?

author: timbeiko
content:
If by "planned" you mean "have a relatively final list of features", then yes. If you mean "are expected to ever happen on Ethereum", then no. 

As we approach the final stages of implementation+testing for these, we'll start planning what comes after ðŸ™‚

author: jeremyp1
content: Thanks, yes, I meant "have a relatively final list of features" ðŸ™‚

author: jeremyp1
content: When do you think it will be known what the next upgrades will be?

author: timbeiko
content:
On that note... 

**ACDE June 8 14:00 UTC, or, in your timezone: <t:1686232800:f>**
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/786
Stream: https://youtube.com/live/LqaR-kdnOoU

Hopefully we can finalize the list of Cancun EIPs on the call tomorrow ðŸ™‚ Here are the ones being considered: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/cancun.md#eips-considered-for-inclusion

author: timbeiko
content: It depends on when this one goes live ðŸ˜„ ! I assume around the time this one is ready to go live on mainnet, we'll have a good idea of what the "main things" for the next one are, and in the weeks/months after that we'll debate what else is included alongside those things.

author: jeremyp1
content: Awesome, thanks! last question, what is current ETA for Deben-Cancun?

author: rubo2
content: hey there. got a question about slot number calculation. given the shapella timestamp of `0x64373057` and beacon chain genesis of `0x5fc63040`, i'm getting slot number `6209537` while it actually is `6209536` (less by one). should i always do `- 1` or the formula is trickier? i'm flooring `(0x64373057 - 0x5fc63040) / 12`
